&FlowMultiTagRowRequest; declare @p char(6), @r nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000)
select top 0 tr.id, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, a.ma_vi_tri, 0 as vi_tri_yn, a.ma_lo, b.lo_yn, b.sua_tk_vt, b.gia_ton, m.ma_vt, a.ma_kho, cast(0 as numeric(19, 3)) as ton13, a.dvt, m.ngay_ct, b.tk_vt, m.ma_bp0, m.ma_nh0, m.ma_vung, n.stt_rec_dh, n.stt_rec0dh, n.stt_rec_hd as stt_rec_sa, n.stt_rec0hd as stt_rec0sa, n.stt_rec_ttmh, n.stt_rec0ttmh, m.stt_rec_kd, m.ngay_lo_kd &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery; into #d from #tagRow tr, bid14$000000 a, bim14$000000 m, dmvt b, bikddmkq kq, dmloai gr, d96$000000 n
set @r = ' insert into #d select tr.id, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, rtrim(a.ma_vi_tri), case when exists(select top 1 ma_kho from dmvitri z where z.ma_kho = a.ma_kho) then 1 else 0 end as vi_tri_yn, rtrim(a.ma_lo), b.lo_yn, b.sua_tk_vt, b.gia_ton, rtrim(m.ma_vt), rtrim(a.ma_kho), cast(0 as numeric(19, 3)) as ton13, rtrim(a.dvt), m.ngay_ct, rtrim(b.tk_vt), rtrim(m.ma_bp0), rtrim(m.ma_nh0), rtrim(m.ma_vung), '''', '''', '''', '''', '''', '''', m.stt_rec_kd, m.ngay_lo_kd &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery; from (select id, stt_rec, stt_rec0 from #tagRow where p = ''%Partition'') tr join bid14$%Partition a on tr.stt_rec = a.stt_rec and tr.stt_rec0 = a.stt_rec0 left join bim14$%Partition m on tr.stt_rec = m.stt_rec left join dmvt b on m.ma_vt = b.ma_vt left join bikddmkq kq on a.ma_kq = kq.ma_kq left join (select ma_loai, ten_loai%l from dmloai where nhom = ''09'') gr on kq.loai_kq = gr.ma_loai where gr.ma_loai = ''2'' '
select distinct p into #p from #tagRow select @p = min(p) from #p while @p is not null begin set @q = replace(@r, '%Partition', @p) exec sp_executesql @q select @p = min(p) from #p where p > @p end
select distinct convert(char(6), ngay_lo_kd, 112) as p into #pkd from #d select @p = min(p) from #pkd while @p is not null begin set @q = ' update a set stt_rec_dh = c.stt_rec_dh, stt_rec0dh = c.stt_rec0dh, stt_rec_sa = c.stt_rec_hd, stt_rec0sa = c.stt_rec0hd, stt_rec_ttmh = c.stt_rec_ttmh, stt_rec0ttmh = c.stt_rec0ttmh from #d a join #tagRow t on a.id = t.id join bikd01$' + @p + ' b on a.stt_rec_kd = b.stt_rec join d96$' + @p + ' c on b.stt_rec_goc = c.stt_rec and b.stt_rec0goc = c.stt_rec0 ' exec sp_executesql @q select @p = min(p) from #pkd where p > @p end
&FlowMultiUpdateCurrentStock; update #d set tk_vt = case when exists(select top 1 ma_kho from dmkho where dmkho.ma_kho = a.ma_kho and dmkho.dai_ly_yn = 1) then rtrim(b.tk_dl) else rtrim(b.tk_vt) end from #d a left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt update #d set ton13 = ton13 / case when he_so <> 0 then he_so else 1 end select '' as array$, id, &OtherCopyField; from #d &FlowMultiOrderBy; return
